participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and nurturing, Emily loves engaging with her students and sharing her passion for learning.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i love to play board games. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach. i'm an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, Jake enjoys staying active and spending time with his dogs.
participant_2.background: eating is something i do when i am bored. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. I've short hair. two dogs live with me.
